text:
@toryboypierce @COVID19 @MattHancock “I am now setting the goal of 100,000 tests per day by the end of this month. That is the goal and I am determined that we will get there.” - Matt Hancock 02/04/20

A goal is not a guarantee written in stone. Anyway 81,000 tests were performed yesterday, so not far off
